response.overview: This is the story of a Russian family who in September 2020, after several months of quarantine and online training, sold their only house in Oslo, closed their mortgage and rented a yacht for a year to go on a trip with their three sons (9, 7 and 5 years old). In the middle of their 10-month regatta in Lisbon, they were experiencing a tipping point - to move on or stop. This story is about how to stop being afraid and start living your life, and not the life of your children, how to escape from a pandemic, lockdowns and restrictions. And how to re-learn to enjoy the little things, like water in the shower or the absence of mold on the ceiling.
response.title: Unbounded Family
